channel.title: Welcome to Doks on My Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to Doks on My Docs

item.title: Example Post
item.description: You can use blog posts for announcing product updates and features.

item.title: Example Guide
item.description: Guides lead a user through a specific task they want to accomplish, often with a sequence of steps. Writing a good guide requires thinking about what your users are trying to do.

item.title: Example Reference
item.description: Reference pages are ideal for outlining how things work in terse and clear terms. Less concerned with telling a story or addressing a specific use case, they should give a comprehensive outline of what your documenting.

item.title: Git 101
item.description:
Adding Deleted Files

Action Command
Stage a deleted file git add path/to/file
Remove and stage git rm path/to/file
All deletions git add -u or git add -u path/to/folder

Undoing Commits and Changes

Undo Last Commit (before push)

Undo the commit, but keep changes staged:

item.title: Minimum Requirements

The JSON payload to create a new client is a DTO (CreateAvaClientDTO). The body consists of the following JSON:

Client Supported Domains

Each client must have at least one email domain associated with their account. This is done via the Ava.Terminal application:

item.title: Travel Search Record
item.description:
Represents a modular travel search record with unique identifier supporting combinations of flights, hotels, cars, etc., and their types.

When TravelType is equal to TravelComponentType.Flight (2), it’s suggested that there is only a Flight. They are not bitwise combinations, but rather unique values.

item.title: 💳 License Agreement Billing Model
item.description:
📦 LicenseAgreement Class

Represents the billing configuration for a customer license or subscription.

🧾 Enums

PaymentTerms

PaymentMethod

BillingType

BillingFrequency

PaymentStatus

RecurringLateFeeOption

🕒 LateFeeConfig

Defines how late fees are applied to overdue invoices.
